TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed TypeLibTypeFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Describes the original settings of the in the COM type library from which the type was imported.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `TypeLibTypeFlags` is used along with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeAttribute>. The flags are retained for reference only. They are not used by the common language runtime.
For more information, see `TYPEFLAGS` in the MSDN library.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FAggregatable = int32(1024)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FAppObject = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A type description that describes an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FCanCreate = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Instances of the type can be created by .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FControl = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The type is a control from which other types will be derived, and should not be displayed to users.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FDispatchable = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: Indicates that the interface derives from , either directly or indirectly.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FDual = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The interface supplies both and V-table binding.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FHidden = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The type should not be displayed to browsers.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FLicensed = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FNonExtensible = int32(128)

Docs.summary: The interface cannot add members at run time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FOleAutomation = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The types used in the interface are fully compatible with Automation, including vtable binding support.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FPreDeclId = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The type is predefined. The client application should automatically create a single instance of the object that has this attribute. The name of the variable that points to the object is the same as the class name of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FReplaceable = int32(2048)

Docs.summary: The object supports , and has default behaviors.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FRestricted = int32(512)

Docs.summary: This flag is intended for system-level types or types that type browsers should not display.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeFlags FReverseBind = int32(8192)

Docs.summary: Indicates base interfaces should be checked for name resolution before checking child interfaces. This is the reverse of the default behavior.
